item.title: 市场氛围好到不能再好了
item.description: 如果说 7 月份是股市的关键考验，那么到目前为止，情况还不错。乐观的盈利、失业救济人数减少、通胀率仍低于 3%，以及新通过的减税政策，所有这些因素加在一起，使市场持续走高。但这是最好的结果吗？【原文：If July is the stock market’s critical test, then so far, so good. Upbeat earnings, lower jobless claims, inflation still under 3% and newly passed tax cuts have all combined to keep the market grinding higher. But is this as good as it gets?】

item.title: 荷兰政府放弃 "不切实际 "的海上风电目标
item.description: 荷兰政府认为到 2040 年实现 50 千兆瓦发电能力的目标不再可行，因此将把海上风力发电的目标削减多达 40%。【原文：The Netherlands will slash its offshore wind ambitions by as much as 40% as the government no longer finds it viable to aim for 50 gigawatts of generation capacity by 2040.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的鲁布纳在劳动节前看好股市
item.description: Citadel 证券公司股票和股票衍生品策略主管斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）周三表示，在季节性因素合谋导致美股下跌之前，美股多头可望在劳动节假期中稳健运行。【原文：US stock bulls can expect a solid run into the Labor Day holiday before seasonal factors conspire to deliver a rockier fall, Citadel Securities’ head of equity and equity derivatives strategy Scott Rubner said Wednesday.】

item.title: 卡冈亚戈认为尽管存在风险，南非消费物价指数仍将保持在目标范围内
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-克甘亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，尽管美国关税带来了不确定性，但南非有信心在未来两年将通胀率保持在目标范围内。【原文：South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago signaled confidence that inflation would remain within its target for the next two years, despite uncertainties stemming from US tariffs.】

item.title: 改革威胁在拍卖前取消英国风电合同
item.description: 英国改革党正威胁风能开发商，如果他们赢得下届大选，将在关键拍卖前取消未来的补贴。【原文：Reform UK is threatening wind developers with the future cancellation of subsidies in the lead up to a key auction, should they win the next election.】

item.title: 谷歌将于 8 月 20 日发布以人工智能为核心的新款 Pixel 硬件
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司将于8月20日在纽约举行的一次活动上首次推出新的Pixel品牌硬件，预计阵容将包括几款智能手机和一款智能手表，所有产品都将采用该公司的人工智能技术。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google will debut new Pixel-branded hardware at an event on Aug. 20 in New York, with the lineup expected to include several smartphones and a smartwatch, all powered by the company’s artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 据说 EDF 正在权衡出售区域供热业务 Dalkia 的各种方案
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）正在权衡各种方案，其中包括出售部分或全部法国地区供热和制冷业务，因为该公司正专注于加强其核电机组和电网。【原文：Electricite de France SA is weighing options that include selling some or all of its French district heating and cooling business as the utility focuses on fortifying its nuclear fleet and the power grid, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 期权交易员押注台积电业绩后股价将扩大涨幅
item.description: 期权交易商押注台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Options traders are betting that Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s stock rally has more to run as optimism grows that its upcoming earnings will alleviate market concerns.】

item.title: 加拿大将限制钢铁进口以减轻特朗普关税的打击
item.description: 加拿大将减少进口商可以免关税进口的外国钢材数量，此举旨在帮助因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对该行业征税而遭受损失的国内生产商。【原文：Canada will reduce the amount of foreign steel that importers can bring in tariff-free, a move to help domestic producers suffering from US President Donald Trump’s levies on the sector.】

item.title: 量子资本称 60 美元左右的油价是利润红区
item.description: 据页岩地区私人运营商的最大投资者之一称，美国油田的开采活动正在放缓，因为钻探者的利润仍处于原油价格的危险区。【原文：Activity is slowing in US oil fields as drillers remain in the crude-price danger zone for profits, according to one of the biggest investors of private operators in the shale patch.】

item.title: 特朗普可能解雇鲍威尔的报道引发美国国债大涨
item.description: 一位白宫官员称，唐纳德-特朗普总统可能很快解雇美联储主席，随后短期美国国债跳涨，美元大跌。【原文：Short-maturity US Treasuries jumped and the dollar plunged after a White House official said President Donald Trump is likely to fire the chief of the Federal Reserve soon.】

item.title: 丰业银行称，卡尼应禁止美国公司将项目作为贸易杠杆
item.description: 加拿大新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）的一位经济学家表示，加拿大应考虑将美国公司排除在大型基础设施和国防项目之外，以此作为对特朗普政府一系列关税措施的回应。【原文：Canada should consider excluding US companies from major infrastructure and defense projects as part of its response to the Trump administration’s barrage of tariffs, according to a Bank of Nova Scotia economist.】

item.title: Meta 投资后，Scale AI 将裁员 14
item.description:
这家人工智能数据标签公司正在裁减200名全职员工，并将停止与500名承包商的合作。【原文：

The AI data-labeling company is laying off 200 full-time employees and will stop working with 500 contractors. 

】

item.title: Eurazeo 成长基金在首次收盘中获得 6.5 亿欧元，用于人工智能投注
item.description: 欧洲投资集团Eurazeo SE在其最新增长基金首次关闭时筹集了6.5亿欧元（约合7.52亿美元）资金，这可能会推动该地区科技公司在人工智能推动下的融资复苏。【原文：European investment group Eurazeo SE has raised €650 million ($752 million) at the first close of its latest growth fund, potentially adding to an AI-fueled recovery in funding for the region’s tech firms.】

item.title: 白宫官员称特朗普可能很快解雇鲍威尔
item.description: 一位白宫官员表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统很可能很快解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，并在周二晚与国会共和党人会面时讨论了这一可能的举动。【原文：President Donald Trump is likely to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell soon, a White House official said, and discussed the possible move in a meeting with congressional Republicans on Tuesday night.】

item.title: 医疗补助削减给市政债券投资者带来的痛苦
item.description: 据估计，唐纳德-特朗普总统的预算法案可能会使数百万美国人失去医疗保险，因此市政债券投资者正准备应对医院和医疗系统日益加剧的财务压力。【原文：President Donald Trump’s budget bill has municipal-bond investors bracing for mounting financial strains on hospitals and health-care systems amid estimates that the legislation could push millions of Americans off their health insurance.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀再次缓解，支持维持利率不变
item.description: 尼日利亚 6 月份的年通胀率连续第三个月下降，这为政策制定者再次维持借贷成本不变提供了依据，因为他们正等待观察这一趋势是否能保持下去。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate fell for a third straight month in June, bolstering the case for policymakers to again keep borrowing costs unchanged as they wait to see if the trend holds.】

item.title: 意大利副总理称欧洲央行应降息削弱欧元走势
item.description: 意大利副总理安东尼奥-塔亚尼（Antonio Tajani）表示，欧洲中央银行应降低借贷成本，通过削弱单一货币来帮助经济发展。【原文：The European Central Bank should reduce borrowing costs to help the economy by weakening the single currency, Italian Deputy Premier Antonio Tajani said.】

item.title: 公交技术公司 Via 与高盛合作重启 IPO
item.description: Via Transportation Inc.是一家致力于帮助人们在城市中出行的科技公司，该公司在最初申请于 2021 年首次公开募股后，又重新启动了上市计划。【原文：Via Transportation Inc., a tech company focused on helping people get around cities, is reviving plans for an initial public offering after originally filing for one in 2021.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利首席执行官认为银行将追回私人信贷收益
item.description: 摩根士丹利首席执行官泰德-皮克（Ted Pick）表示，私人信贷的 "潮汐可能开始转变"。【原文：Morgan Stanley Chief Executive Officer Ted Pick said “the tide may begin to shift” in the ocean of private credit.】

item.title: 辛格的埃利奥特公司与得克萨斯州私募股权公司就费用问题展开争论
item.description: 保罗-辛格（Paul Singer）的埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）因其频繁的法律争斗而声名鹊起，其目的是从对上市公司的投资中榨取更多价值。现在，该公司又在不透明的私募股权投资领域为收费问题挑起事端。【原文：Paul Singer’s Elliott Investment Management built a reputation for its frequent legal brawls to squeeze more value from its investments in public companies. Now the firm is picking a fight over charges in the opaque world of private equity.】

item.title: 即使美联储保持警惕，最大银行的贷款收益率仍在下降
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对美联储今年没有降低利率感到沮丧。无论如何，美国最大银行的贷款收益率正在稳步下降。【原文：President Donald Trump is frustrated that the Federal Reserve hasn’t lowered interest rates this year. At the biggest US banks, loan yields are steadily dropping anyway.】

item.title: Wizz 退出阿布扎比，数百名员工陷入困境
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）暂停阿布扎比业务的决定使多达 450 个工作岗位陷入困境，因为一些员工将无法迁往欧洲。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc’s decision to suspend its Abu Dhabi operation has put up to 450 jobs in limbo, as some employees will find it impossible to relocate to Europe.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 公司与沙特 Humain 公司就数据中心交易进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 正在讨论在沙特阿拉伯租赁数据中心容量的事宜，这是该公司在提供廉价能源和政治善意的地区扩大基础设施的努力的一部分。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup, xAI, is in discussions to lease data center capacity in Saudi Arabia, according to people familiar with the matter, part of an effort to expand its infrastructure in regions offering cheap energy and political goodwill.】

item.title: 关键劳动力市场数据公布前，英镑面临十年来最差走势风险
item.description: 英镑创下十年来最长跌势，因为交易员们期待着可能支持降息的关键劳动力市场数据。【原文：The pound headed for its longest slide in a decade as traders looked ahead to key labor market data that could bolster the case for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: ASML 首席财务官称贸易战让客户现在比四月份更担心
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席财务官罗杰-达森（Roger Dassen）表示，与 4 月份相比，ASML 的客户现在更担心全球贸易战，这家荷兰公司指责关税给其明年的销售前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：ASML Holding NV’s clients are more worried about the global trade war now than they were in April, Chief Financial Officer Roger Dassen said, as the Dutch firm blamed tariffs for clouding its sales outlook next year.】

item.title: 欧洲当局瓦解亲俄黑客组织
item.description: 自 2022 年俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰以来，该组织已声称对 1000 多次拒绝服务攻击负责。【原文：European authorities said they’ve disrupted the computer infrastructure of a pro-Russian hacktivist group that’s claimed responsibility for more than 1,000 denial-of-service attacks since Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.】

item.title: 特朗普软化对华立场以确保习近平峰会和贸易协议的达成
item.description: 熟悉内部商议的人士说，唐纳德-特朗普总统已经降低了与中国对抗的语调，以努力确保与中国总统习近平举行峰会，并与世界第二大经济体达成贸易协议。【原文：President Donald Trump has dialed down his confrontational tone with China in an effort to secure a summit with counterpart Xi Jinping and a trade deal with the world’s second-largest economy, people familiar with internal deliberations said.】

item.title: 伯尔尼称瑞士与美国的贸易协议正等待特朗普签署
item.description: 据瑞士政府称，瑞士官员近两周前批准了与美国的框架贸易协议草案，目前正在继续谈判，同时等待唐纳德-特朗普总统的签字批准。【原文：Swiss officials approved the draft of a framework trade deal with the US almost two weeks ago, and are continuing talks while awaiting sign off from President Donald Trump, according to the government.】

item.title: 英国解除对巴基斯坦航班的禁令，促进巴基斯坦航空公司的销售前景
item.description: 英国航空当局在大约五年后取消了对巴基斯坦航空公司在英国运营的限制，因为这个南亚国家已经达到了英国的安全标准。【原文：British aviation authorities have lifted restrictions on Pakistani carriers to operate in the UK after about five years as the South Asian nation has complied with their safety standards.】
